title: Ione Adair, 1977-02-24, Interview #5
creator: Schrager, Sam
description: With Bernadine Cornelison. Women homesteaders in the timber. Experiences of 1910 fire. Friendship with father. Dr. Watkins family. Carrie Bush and Mary Borah. 2-24-77 2.5 hr 59p
family origin: Parents came from Oregon and Indiana (1893); family lived in the McConnell mansion (1900-36)
occupation: County assessor, teacher, postal clerk, timber homesteader
